summary: Funko anuncia nova linha de colecionáveis de Harry Potter
title: Funko anuncia nova linha de colecionáveis de Harry Potter
description:
Uma nova linha de colecionáveis de Harry Potter foi anunciada pela Funko, durante um evento para produtores de brinquedos e jogos em Londres. A nova coleção terá três linhas de bonecos: 5 Star Funko Pop!, Vynl’s, e pelúcias SuperCute.

A coleção Harry Potter 5 Star terá Harry, Rony e Hermione com os uniformes para a aula de Herbologia sobre Mandrágoras. As figuras virão com protetores de ouvido removíveis e um vaso com uma Mandrágora.

Clique para exibir o slide.

Na mesma linha, será lançado um boneco do elfo doméstido Dobby, que virá com uma meia e o diário de Tom Riddle, baseado em sua aparição em Harry Potter e a Câmara Secreta.

Na linha Vynl’s serão lançados bonecos da Luna Lovegood e do Neville Longbottom. Luna estará usando óculos (spectrepecs) e segurando uma cópia dO Pasquim. Neville terá em suas mãos a planta Mimbulus mimbletonia, seu presente de aniversário em Harry Potter e a Ordem da Fênix.

Na linha de pelúcias SuperCute Plush serão lançados quatro novos produtos: Harry, Rony e Hermione, todos com o Chapéu Seletor e a Fawkes, a fênix de Dumbledore.

Ainda não há data de lançamento para os novos produtos.

The post Funko anuncia nova linha de colecionáveis de Harry Potter appeared first on Potterish.com.

summary: desperate times call for criminal measures - отчаянные времена требуют криминальных мер
title: desperate times call for criminal measures - отчаянные времена требуют криминальных мер
description:
by Silwery_Wind

Гарри нравится Колин. Он - хороший человек, и ещё лучший работник. Трудолюбивый, целеустремленный, умный, общительный… Что может быть не так? Но реальные финансы “Хедвиг” не совпадают с записями, и есть только одна возможная причина. Гарри хочет знать - почему, и этот ответ не находится методом исключения.

К счастью, у него есть Том.

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

blog.name: slytherin-sarcasm
blog.title: Sarcastic (and Sometimes Savage) Slytherin
blog.description:
It often takes another Slytherin to interpret one Slytherin's use of sarcasm. 

16 years-old/she-her

summary:
“‘I’d die for you,’
That’s easy to say. 
There’s a list of people that I would take
A bullet for them
A bullet for you
A bullet...
body:
“‘I’d die for you,’

That’s easy to say.

There’s a list of people that I would take

A bullet for them

A bullet for you

A bullet for everybody in this room.

But I don’t see many bullets coming through (see many bullets coming through).


Metaphorically, I’m the man,

But literally, I don’t know what I’d do


I’d live for you

and that’s hard to do.

Even harder to say,

When you know it’s not true.

Even harder to write,

When you know that tonight

There were people back home

Who tried talking to you

But you ignored them still.


All these questions;

They’re for real.

Like who would you live for?

Who would you die for?

And, would you ever kill?”

-Slytherin

summary: George: Place your bets here! First Task bets, lads and ladies! Fred: Harry Potter versus the dragon! Will he emerge victorious,...
body:
George: Place your bets here! First Task bets, lads and ladies!

Fred: Harry Potter versus the dragon! Will he emerge victorious, golden egg in hand? Or–

Harry: OR?!

Fred: Harry! Beautiful morning to remain very much alive, eh?

Harry: You’re taking wagers on whether I’ll make it through this task or not, aren’t you?!

George: Why, Harry! How could you think such a thing! We’re taking wagers on how QUICKLY you’ll emerge victorious. Not an imminent death wager in sight.

Random Slytherin: But you guys just took my five galleons on Potter being devour–

Fred: Shut it, shove off.

Harry:

George: Look over here. We’re also selling The Boy Who Lived shirts. The Boy Who LIVED, not The Boy Who Was Brutally Murdered By A Dragon.

Fred: Frankly, Harry, I’m hurt.

Harry: Sorry, lads. I guess I’m just on edge. It means a lot that you’ve got faith in me. See you after the task?

George: Absolutely!

Fred: Go get ‘em, champ!

George: Hurry up and help me charm all those The Boy Who Was Tragically Incinerated shirts we sold?

Fred: Absolutely.

summary: Draco: *absently calls Harry “Skippy” for the 347 time* Harry: Hey Draco, why do you call me Skippy anyways? Draco: Because you...
body:
Draco: *absently calls Harry “Skippy” for the 347 time*

Draco: Because you can’t skip, obviously

summary: ”Who are you and what business do you have with Ivan Sidorov?” Sibes demanded without so much as a greeting, striding out from...
body:
”Who are you and what business do you have with Ivan Sidorov?” Sibes demanded without so much as a greeting, striding out from the shadows toward the approaching figure, long ponytail fluttering in the light wind. ”Tell me now unless you enjoy the thought of spilling your guts on these cobblestones. And I do mean that literally.” Her claw-like nails flashed in the moonlight as a deadly smile crossed her lips. Sibes hoped the person gave her a reason to use her claws.

Sibes Sodorova, http://merlinamm.forumotion.com

Free forum : Merlin Academy of Magical Arts

summary: Figure skater!Harry and older coach!Draco pining for him. If I may ask for Draco’s internal monologue while he watches Harry...
question: Figure skater!Harry and older coach!Draco pining for him. If I may ask for Draco’s internal monologue while he watches Harry performing in the ice
answer:
Hello hun! I hope this is what you meant. 

*************************************************************************************

“I want to add one more spiral to the end” Harry says, skating towards his coach Draco.

Draco nodded in agreement, yes that would be better, after he let Harry drink some more, he sent him back on the ice.

“The whole routine again” he states clearly, starting the music.

And Harry starts again, all smooth movements, elegant over the ice like some sort of exotic bird.

Harry came to him 3 years ago, asking to be trained further. Said he heard rumours about how Coach Malfoy, would bring anyone who he thought worthy to the top of the ice-skating world. At first Draco been doubtful, the boy didn’t look as someone who could do a lot yet. So,he said him to show what he could do so far. Draco had been very surprised. The only thing missing at the boy’s technique was elegance.

Smiling, he looked to Harry now, still doing his routine. Elegance he had for sure now. Maybe even a little bit too much elegance. The movements of the other man were spot on. All the training giving him a very nice figure. His bottom sure became bigger over the years. Something Draco loved to look at while Harry didn’t notice.

It was truly a shame that Harry was 6 years his minor. He was too old for him, at least that’s what he told himself. That way he wouldn’t do anything impulsive like pin Harry down underneath him andhave his wicked ways with him.

The pure torture however was the days were Draco would join Harry on the ice. Skating with him, closely behind him. Little touches all the time. Afterwards they would both be sweaty and very much in need of a shower. There weren’t separate shower stalls at the building they were, so to see Harry naked these days, first sweaty and later with waterdrops making their way down to his v line. Well let’s just say most of the time,Draco had either to turn away quickly or shower a lot colder than he wished to.

“TADA”.

The excited shout of Harry pulled him from his thoughts. He clapped slowly, although he didn’t get to see much of the routine, he was quite sure Harry nailed it. Otherwise he wouldn’t do the shout of excitement.

Joining him at the side, Harry sat down and took his skates off.

“I’m going to shower; would you maybe like to get a hot chocolate after?” Harry asked him, blushing slightly.

Not believing his luck, Harry never asked him such before, he always went home after their training session; he could feel himself nodding, forcing himself to say a simple yes.

“Great, I will see you at the bar than” with these words Harry walked towards the shower, leaving Draco alone.

After a few seconds, he went to the bar and ordered two hot chocolates with marshmallows on one of them, since he knew Harry adored those. He was determined not to screw this up, and then maybe maybe he could show Harry they could be more than just coach and pupil, moret han friends. Just maybe they could be partners for life.

So, when Harry joined him at the table, he smiled, handing him the hot chocolate with marshmallows and started to talk. Making sure to leave Harry blushing from time to time.

And if this eventually leaded to them being more than professional together, no one had to know. Except them.

summary: Song of the day  A Phoenix Lament by Ministry of Magic Album: Acoustiatus (2008) - I know that’s not the same as the video...
caption:
Song of the day

A Phoenix Lament by Ministry of Magic

Album: Acoustiatus (2008) - I know that’s not the same as the video version, but it is the version I actually have on my playlist.

I love fanfics that dive deep into all the trauma and pain that must have been the result of fighting the war against Voldemort and losing so many friends and loved ones - there’s just this big gap between “somebody dies every two pages” and “All is Well” in which canon leaves a gaping hole (not that I’m complaining, some things can be left for fan interpretation). At any rate, this is basically those fanfics, except condensed into one 3 minute song, and it is amazing.

Favourite lyrics:

It’s not enough
To say that time
Can mend my wings
That one day I’ll fly
And it’s not enough
This acheless scar
Some wounds are still burning
Let me live as one earning his life
